title: Casa Veche
typeOfFood: Lacto, Pizza, Western, Beer/Wine, Romanian, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. The menu, in Romanian and English, has a vegetarian section and kitchen is able accommodate vegan and other food allergies. Traditional Romanian foods such as polenta, mushrooms, and vegetable dishes plus pizza and a few other western dishes. Not all of the vegan dishes are available every day, but there are choices.
